parameter.name: dateFrom
parameter.description: Returns chats with any of its activities matching the date. Defaults to the beginning of time.

parameter.name: dateTo
parameter.description: Returns chats with any of its activities matching the date. Defaults to today.

parameter.name: timezone
parameter.description: Timezone in the TZ format (e.g. America/Phoenix)

parameter.name: visitorId
parameter.description: Return chats with specified visitor id.

parameter.name: agent
parameter.description: Return chats for given agent login.

parameter.name: group
parameter.description: Return chats for given group id.

parameter.name: goal
parameter.description: Return chats for given goal id.

parameter.name: hasGoal
parameter.description: 1 or 0. If 1 is passed, returns chats having any goal.

parameter.name: queued
parameter.description: 1 or 0. If 1 is passed, returns chats started from queue.

parameter.name: rate
parameter.description: Filter chats considering its rating status. Available values: rated, not_rated, rated_good, rated_bad.

parameter.name: includePending
parameter.description: 1 or 0. Whether to include chats that haven't yet ended.

parameter.name: tag
parameter.description: Filter chats by a specified tag.

parameter.name: tagged
parameter.description: 1 or 0. If 1 is passed, returns chats having any tag. If 0 passed, returns chats without any tag.
